Dialogs.Text: Thomas B: I don't know how much time this guy has been a follower... Or from where they know me...
Thomas B: But one thing is certain, they know me since i had... My previous channel.
Thomas B: Also, i'm not sure on how much information has, but what they know is probably enough to make an scandal on social media.
Thomas B: So... In simple terms, i'm stuck here until i figure a way out.
Thomas B: That could be if either the legend is real and can actually find the damn thing.
Thomas B: Or if i can prove or convince this dude the thing he is looking for doesn't actually exists.
Thomas B: Either way, tomorrow seems that i have to connect again and actually explore this place again...
Thomas B: ...The fact that i used this place before doesn't make it any easier, but better that the past stays here than it gets out.
Thomas B: Okay then... Now that i have everything in order for tomorrow... It's time to disconnect.
Thomas B: Just staying up and further pondering on this is not going to make things go faster.

Elections.CandidateName: He knows me from way back
It's a member inside this chat
